querySql: select account_id,user_id,shop_id,replace(replace(replace(`shop_name`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`user_name`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),account_type,account_level,replace(replace(replace(`user_mobile`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`pay_pwd`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`id_card`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),account_amount,frozen_amount,arrears_amount,gift_amount,is_signed,info_id,status,replace(replace(replace(`create_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`update_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),technical_amount,security_amount,frozen_gift_amount from vvic_user_account
